about: I co-founded Know Your Developerâ„¢ (KYD), a developer trust platform that aggregates data from disparate open and permissioned sources to generate trust scoresâ€”portable, provable, and private. It helps companies verify technical talent based on real-world signals, not rÃ©sumÃ©s or gamed testsâ€”and empowers developers to own and share a verified record of their credibility.

description.text: Leading development for KYDâ„¢, a trust intelligence platform that assesses developer credibility, risk, and AI usage across public data sources. Spearheading system architecture, proprietary scoring algorithms, and secure data ingestion pipelines. Driving innovation in developer verification, compliance tooling, and AI accountability to support organizations operating in high-stakes, regulated environments.
